selected_quotes: An important finding about the validity of Mturk for ideology research.
Nice! New results suggest that MTurk is a valid recruitment tool for psychological research on political ideology
Interesting, but uses MTurk. Liberals on MT more liberal on issues values than nat'l counterparts
Authoritarianism predicts econ liberalism if you control for racial resentment (Fig. 4)

news.title: Does social science have a replication crisis?
news.summary: What population sample will bring us wisdom? This eagle owl is pictured at a zoo in Mulhouse, eastern France.

blogs.title: Does social science have a replication crisis?
blogs.summary: Last year, a widely reported paper in Science found that less than half of published research in top, peer-reviewed psychology journals failed to replicate when the studies were repeated by other researchers. Last week, a new commentary in Science call
